title: HeartbeatMessage
description: The Intraday Platform uses Heartbeat Ping messages to inform a client that the server is alive and to let the client perform consistency checking of the data received.

topic.description: A topic that the current user is subscribed to

lastSequenceNumber.description: Last x-nps-sequenceNo value for packets sent to the topic (see Message sequencing)

timestamp.description: Timestamp of the Heartbeat generation in Unix Epoch Milliseconds format.
